data.eml:eml: Cebudonus poppeorum, a new genus and new species of eumedonine crab (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Pilumnidae) from the Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L. (2014): Cebudonus poppeorum, a new genus and new species of eumedonine crab (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Pilumnidae) from the Philippines. Zootaxa 3815 (1): 94-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3815.1.6
